Super Color CPU Board  

 

   Super Color CPU Installation Manual

  

 

 

 

Super Color CPU board - Front

Super Color CPU board - Back

 

The Super Color CPU board is a really nicely designed CPU board replacement for the Atari 400/800 computers.   It greatly improves the video output on both systems and it very conveniently provides the ability to configure to match all variations of the 6502 CPU from the standard 6502B to the Atari "SALLY" 6502C.  It also supports both NTSC and PAL settings as well.  it has connections for the "Incognito" 800 OS Board lines.   This was a very well thought out design and it a must have addition to anyone's Atari 400/800 computer.
